key.name: popup-location
key.description: Default popup location on the workspace for stack notifications. Allowed values: "top_left","top_right","bottom_left" and "bottom_right"

key.name: theme
key.description: The theme used when displaying notifications.

key.name: sound-enabled
key.description: Turns on and off sound support for notifications.

key.name: default-sound
key.description: The default sound file used unless a notification supplies the 'sound-file' or 'suppress-sound' hint. Leave empty for no default sound.
